name: com.meta.witai

samples.description: Installs a package that includes the OVR Lipsync dlls for use with TTS and other voice based services where lipsync is needed, but not provided server side.
A scene with simple text UI to show Wit responses.
The sample code that goes with the Shapes tutorial.
A sample scene for performing text-to-speech requests by customizing two voices and having them speak.
A sample scene for performing text-to-speech requests that include lip sync information and viewing a character respond with lip sync enabled.

description: wit-unity is the Unity SDK for Wit.ai. It provides convenience tools for activating Wit and processing the responses that are returned.
